title: Costa Rica
description: This is not a standalone book. Please start with book one and enjoy the ride. This is book thirty of an eighty part series.  Morgan has to figure out how she's going to deal with an issue in Hawaii, but she has the help of a few old friends by her side. In Costa Rica, she meets the handsome Mr. Segura, but he's not the only one who has his eyes on her.  ****Special Note to readers***** Morgan is a high-end call girl. Her clients are gorgeous, wealthy and they know how to please a woman.   This is a novella with a word count over 33,000.
author: Rebecca Ratliff
